item.title: Starter command error
item.dc:creator: @dvdnext dvdnext
item.description:
@dvdnext wrote:

ok my prob is that i added this code

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 50000000); addItem(841, 1); addItem(392, 1000); addItem(892, 50); sM("You recieve the offical DRKSCAPE Starter packet! Enjoy the XP!"); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (starter == 1) { sM("Sorry."); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Is a fag and trying to get 2 starters and u can get only 1!");

Then i get those 2 erroz

client.java:7363: cannot find symbol symbol : method savemoreinfo() location: class client savemoreinfo(); ^ client.java:7364: cannot find symbol symbol : method savechar() location: class client savechar(); ^ errorzz !2! u maby could fix it :)
how to fix it
